Dear @Pradeep Poojary <mailto:pradeep.poojary@unic-nasco.com> ,

 

I hope you are doing well .

 

Please find attached the claim form for the delivered damaged items for the months of March and April 2025 from the Riyadh warehouse, with the 10% discount already applied.

Additionally, the returns lost order has also been included.

All the required supporting documents have been uploaded to the link below. Kindly note that the link will expire within 7 days:

 

https://fex.net/s/fsr6zfk

 

 

Thank you ,

SB
